meanings.definition: A road designed for high-speed traffic, typically with multiple lanes and no intersections.
meanings.sent1: The freeway was busy with cars zooming by.
meanings.sent2: I take the freeway to work every morning to avoid traffic.
meanings.sent3: The freeway was so empty, it felt like a race track.
meanings.sent4: Life is like a freeway, full of twists and turns.
meanings.sent5: The freeway stretched out ahead like a ribbon of asphalt.

meanings.sent1: We drove down the freeway without having to pay any tolls.
meanings.sent2: The freeway was a convenient route for our road trip.
meanings.sent3: I couldn't believe we found a freeway that was toll-free!
meanings.sent4: The freeway was a smooth path without any toll booths in sight.
meanings.sent5: The freeway was a welcome sight after driving on toll roads all day.
